aquarium.items

Class AquariumItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • aquarium.items.AquariumItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MobileItem, Seastone, Seaweed

    public abstract class AquariumItem
extends java.lang.Object
    An AquariumItem is a visual component to be displayed in the Aquarium (e.g., stone, seaweed, fish). The class is abstract meaning that an AquariumItem has to be extended in order to be instantiated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AquariumItem(int minWidth, int maxWidth, java.lang.String imagePath)
      Constructs an Aquarium Item of random width between minWidth and maxWidth using the image at imagePath
      AquariumItem(int width, java.lang.String imagePath)
      Constructs an Aquarium Item of a given width using the image at imagePath
